section.p:
We seek to generate long-term value, i.e. we want to develop profitable businesses that are socially and environmentally responsible. This allows us to build trust and transcend as an organization.
Our sustainability policy defines clear guidelines and commitments about the 7 most important topics for our sustainable management.
